QuestData.Title: Magic of the Arakkoa
QuestData.Description: Outland holds many secrets, $n. It's only a matter of time before we uncover them all.$B$BThe half-bird, half-man species of the arakkoa possesses ancient arcane knowledge that would aid us greatly in our exploration of this world. Travel to the Den of Haal'esh, south of here. Obtain any magical scrolls that the Haal'eshi might be carrying on them and bring them to me.
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring 4 Haal'eshi Scrolls to Arcanist Calesthris Dawnstar at Falcon Watch in Hellfire Peninsula.
QuestData.CompletionText: Have you obtained the scrolls yet, $N?
QuestData.RewardText: Good work, $N. Outland's secrets will not stay hidden from us for very long.$B$BIt's our destiny to become the masters of this world.
